channel.title: MYSQL problem
channel.description: SQL query: define( "MYSQL_HOST", "mysql8.000webhost.com" ); MySQL said: #1064 - You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'define("MYSQL_HOST", "mysql8.000webhost.com")' at line 1

item.title: MYSQL problem
item.dc:creator: @h3rbl0re h3rbl0re
item.description:
@h3rbl0re wrote:

SQL query:

define(

“MYSQL_HOST”, “mysql8.000webhost.com”
);

MySQL said:

#1064 - You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ‘define(“MYSQL_HOST”, “mysql8.000webhost.com”)’ at line 1

Read full topic
